actions.committee: Committee on Environment and Public Works
actions.text: Referred to the Committee on Environment and Public Works.

official_title: A resolution acknowledging the severity of the wetland loss occurring in Louisiana and supporting the observance of World Wetlands Day in the United States.

summary.text: Acknowledges the severity of the wetland loss occurring in Louisiana. Supports: (1) observance of World Wetlands Day in the United States; and (2) efforts to raise awareness about the critical need to preserve wetlands in Louisiana, the United States, and throughout the world.

titles.title: A resolution acknowledging the severity of the wetland loss occurring in Louisiana and supporting the observance of World Wetlands Day in the United States.
